Uses of Interface
org.openide.loaders.DataObject.Factory

  • Packages that use DataObject.Factory 
    Package Description
    org.openide.loaders
    Datasystems are the logical layer between a filesystem and higher-level file-oriented operations.

    • Uses of DataObject.Factory in org.openide.loaders

      Classes in org.openide.loaders that implement DataObject.Factory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataLoader
      A data loader recognizes FileObjects and creates appropriate DataObjects to represent them.
      class  MultiFileLoader
      Loader for any kind of MultiDataObject.
      class  UniFileLoader
      Support class for loader handling one file at a time.
      Methods in org.openide.loaders that return DataObject.Factory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends DataObject>
      DataObject.Factory      		 DataLoaderPool.factory(Class<T> dataObjectClass, String mimeType, Image image)
      Factory method to create default implementation of a factory for data objects.
